uvi.description:
usb: dwc2: check return value after calling platform_get_resource()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.152 by commit 8b9c1c33e51d0959f2aec573dfbac0ffd3f5c0b7. For more details please see the references link.
